title: 1908 New Broomfield, PA Baseball Team Postcard from "Buck Barker" - SOLD

posts.post_title: 1908 New Broomfield, PA Baseball Team Postcard from "Buck Barker" - SOLD
posts.post_content: 1908 New Broomfield, PA, Baseball Team Postcard from "Buck Barker" Collection.  B&W printed, VG condition, light corner creases, edge/corner wear.  $25.00 ppd., Paypal F&F (JSRNA@aol.com), check or money order.  Thank you.  Jim
